event-group.title: adjust visibility of the Buy button

sub-events.comment: Populate the big list of quests
For event-based quests, the name of the quest needs to match the name of the event in the Stat dictionary.
For level-based quests, the name of the quest should be translated correctly by the "get level of" function.
Note: It's important to put the conditions ABOVE the function "get or create", otherwise, it creates empty quests.
collected cabbage
Collected salads
quest qui donne des pills
Gives pills only if the menhir is below level 4 and the player isn't trying to stockpile a bunch of pills
Le Else fait en sorte the la quest s'overwrite quand elle n'est plus disponible pour donner des pills, et se met à donner des tofus à la place.
sent lions on mission
